page.title: 06 TRAFFIC SURVEY
page.content: The area we studies had the M1 Motorway passing through it. This is the busiest road system in Northern Ireland. We carried out three traffic surveys on our square. The first involved counting the traffic flow to and from Belfast in a ten minute period. In our second study we did a similar survey but divided the vehicles into two categories, commercial traffic and domestic traffic. Our final study was simlar to first except that we counted the vehicles on Finaghy Road North to compare the traffic on a main road with a motorway. All surveys were carried out mid morning. SURVEY To BELFAST From BELFAST 1 164 157 2 146 36 3 37 48
